00014 template <class T>
00015 FCDLibrary<T>::FCDLibrary(FCDocument* document) : FCDObject(document)
00016 {
00017 }

00019 template <class T>
00020 FCDLibrary<T>::~FCDLibrary()
00021 {
00022 }
00023 
00024 // Read in a list of entities for a library of a COLLADA document
00025 template <class T>
00026 bool FCDLibrary<T>::LoadFromXML(xmlNode* node)
00027 {
00028     bool status = true;
00029     for (xmlNode* entityNode = node->children; entityNode != NULL; entityNode = entityNode->next)
00030     {
00031         if (entityNode->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE)
00032         {
00033             T* entity = AddEntity();
00034             status &= (entity->LoadFromXML(entityNode));
00035         }
00036     }
00037 
00038     SetDirtyFlag();
00039     return status;
00040 }
00041 
00042 // Write out the library to the COLLADA XML document
00043 template <class T>
00044 void FCDLibrary<T>::WriteToXML(xmlNode* node) const
00045 {
00046     for (typename FCDEntityContainer::const_iterator itEntity = entities.begin(); itEntity != entities.end(); ++itEntity)
00047     {
00048         const T* entity = (const T*) (*itEntity);
00049         entity->WriteToXML(node);
00050     }
00051 }
00052 
00053 // Search for the entity in this library with a given COLLADA id.
00054 template <class T>
00055 T* FCDLibrary<T>::FindDaeId(const fm::string& _daeId)
00056 {
00057     const char* daeId = FUDaeParser::SkipPound(_daeId);
00058     for (typename FCDEntityContainer::iterator itEntity = entities.begin(); itEntity != entities.end(); ++itEntity)
00059     {
00060         FCDEntity* found = (*itEntity)->FindDaeId(daeId);
00061         if (found != NULL && found->GetObjectType() == T::GetClassType())
00062         {
00063             return (T*) found;
00064         }
00065     }
00066     return NULL;
00067 }
